events.title: Manfred von Richthofen, the "Red Baron", is shot down and killed

movie.title: The Red Baron
movie.plot: Richthofen goes off to war like thousands of other men. As fighter pilots, they become cult heroes for the soldiers on the battlefields. Marked by sportsmanlike conduct, technical exactitude and knightly propriety, they have their own code of honour. Before long he begins to understand that his hero status is deceptive. His love for Kate, a nurse, opens his eyes to the brutality of war.

events.title: Louis Zamperini's plane is damaged during a raid on Nauru

movie.title: Unbroken
movie.plot: A chronicle of the life of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic runner who was taken prisoner by Japanese forces during World War II.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 29 nominations.
